```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    head = df.head()
    results = df.describe()
    return [head, results]

preview_data(data)
```




Start a branch called describe. In ps3_pair.qmd, modify the function so that it returns a list where the first object is the material printed as the head and the second object is the results from running describe on the data frame. Push your branch to github remote.
